DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the safety and efficacy of the Carl Zeiss Meditec VisuMax femtosecond laser for lamellar resection (ReLEx smile) in the reduction of myopia.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of ReLEx Smile for Laser Correction of Myopia
DOC.detailed_description: Quality control study of patients treated with ReLEx smile for myopia at the Department of Ophthalmology, Aarhus University Hospital. The patients will be followed with standard clinical techniques (slit-lamp examination, refraction, topography) during their normal follow-up up to 12 months after treatment.
DOC.criteria: Indication for keratorefractive correction of myopia Patient consent to undergo keratorefractive correction of myopia Pregnant or lactating women
